description: Up in the mountains it was really cold, so when we asked the guys if they wanted to do a polar bear plunge they were a little hesitant. Joey was a little nervous but once Brodie agreed, everyone was on board. We hiked down to this amazing waterfall and checked it out. It was relaxing and peaceful…for a little bit. Once we got back at the house the guys take turns on Lane and pound him harder than we really have ever seen before here at SeanCody and really take turns railing his ass. In this film, Lane goes out of his way to prove that he may be the best bottom we have ever had.
title: Winter Getaway: Day 4
